income_messages:
From: s************1@outlook.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-13 14:30:49
SUBJECT: From : Serah Peter, machinegroup@ppc-seo.cz, serahpeter0101@outlook.com
Attn: My Dear ,
Please use this money for the Churches/Islamist and Less Privileged in
the world.
Greetings to you and your family in the name of God,in my search for a
reliable and God fearing person and having gotten your contact through
prayers and pains taking efforts via searching i made on the internet
on my bed side.
I am Mrs.Serah Peter from Jordan, I am married to Dr.Alan Peter who
worked with Jordan embassy in Republic of Benin for nine years, before
he died in the year 2018 we were both married for six years
without a child.
He died after a brief illness that lasted for only four days. Before
his death we were both involved in charity services. Since his death I
decided not to re-marry or get a child outside my matrimonial home
which is against my principle. When my late husband was alive he
deposited the sum of $10 (Ten U.S.Dollars) with Bank in Republic of Benin.
Presently, this money is still invested in this Bank in Republic of
Benin. Recently, my doctor told me that I would not last for the next
three months due to my cancer problem.Although what disturbs me most
is my stroke sickness. Having known my condition of health I have
decided to donate this fund to charity, orphanage or an individual
that will utilize this money the way I am going to instruct here in.
I want an individual that will use these fund-to-fund
charity,orphanages and widows and to ensure that these set of people
are well maintained. I took this decision because I don’t have any
child that will inherit this money and my husband relatives are well
of and I don’t want my husband’s hard earned money to be misused by
them. As I do not want a situation whereby this money will be used in
an ungodly manner,Hence the reasons for taking this bold decision.
As soon as I receive your reply I shall give you the contact of the
Bank in Republic of Benin.I will also issue you power of Attorney that
will prove you as the original-beneficiary of this said fund. I want
you to see to the need of the less privileges. My happiness is that I
lived a fulfilled life and l don’t have any regrets in life.
And also attach to me in your return mail your personal details for
familiarity,May the good lord bless you.
Your Full Names
Your Age/ Sex
Marital Status
Occupation
Mobile Numbers/Fax
Your International Passport/Working ID/Driving License.
Hoping to hear from you soonest and do notify your interest to help me
assist charity.
Best regards.
Mrs.Serah Peter, machinegroup@ppc-seo.cz, serahpeter0101@outlook.com
From: s************1@outlook.com
To: vg45050@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 16:11:41
SUBJECT: Re: From : Serah Peter
From: Mrs. Serah Peter ,
Attn :My Dear Gloria Garcia,
Thanks for your reply and the good feelings you have for me and human survival, The actual reason i contacted you is that you will stand in my place to make a good donation of this fund in quest to use these fund-to-facilitate charity works, orphanages and widows and ensure that these set of people are well maintained as many as you may know all over the world, your role is in two phase, the first phase is to claim the fund out from the Bank where the fund is been deposited before the untimely death of my late Husband, may his soul rest in perfect peace, Amen, Another Phase is to make a good donation of this fund. I contacted you in good faith because i hope in my spirit that you will be able to make this claim and use this fund in a rightful way.
This is an assignment I am offering you and I want you to know that it requires only a matured mind to understand all I am saying. Note that this assignment has to be kept strictly confidential in fact my dealing with you has to be confidential not known to anybody so that my late Husband relatives will not know about this development also, and again for this transaction to be successful, a high level of confidentiality is required.
I wish to know some details about you more. As you know, we have never met or done anything prior to this type before and it's not so easy to starting with $10.5M (Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand U.S.Dollars). I have to be sure that you will not grab the opportunity and sit on the money when it gets to you especially now death is knocking on my door. So, to this vein I ask for the following data from you.
1) Full Name :
2) Address /Country :
3) Your Telephone Number :
4) Age / Occupation :
5)A copy of your Id or Driving license :
When I have your consent and the above information, I will prepare an Power Of Attorney from Ministry Of Justice and send to you to authorize you to perfect the claim, Then you will send also the Power Of Attorney to the bank accredited Attorney in Republic of Benin whom my husband informed me before his death to handle all transactions regarding this fund at any point in time to start up this transaction and it is upon the provision of the above stated information, We can move forward by involving my family Attorney at Benin to help you move the fund out of Benin Republic to your Account.
Thanks.
Sincerely,
Mrs. Serah Peter.
outbound_messages:
From: vg45050@m**************m
To: s************1@outlook.com
Time: 2023-03-13 14:31:05
SUBJECT: Re: From : Serah Peter, machinegroup@ppc-seo.cz, serahpeter0101@outlook.com
Hi, 
I'm sorry to hear that you're going through a tough time. I hope things get better for you soon. Is there anything I might be able to do to help?
 Kind Regards,
Gloria Garcia
___________________________________
Gloria Garcia,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
From: vg45050@m**************m

Time: 2023-03-15 18:14:07
SUBJECT: Re: From : Serah Peter
Dear Serah, 
Has there been any updates on your situation? I'm concerned about your wellbeing.
 Kind Regards,
Gloria Garcia
